Who do we serve?

We primarily serve low-income and elderly individuals residing in the state of California. Unfortunately, we are unable to accept every client. Please note that at this time this site is not equipped to file married-filing-separate (MFS) returns, itemized returns, out of state returns, prior year returns, resident aliens claiming a tax treaty, business use of home, or net operating loss.
